verses.roman: aśvattha-vṛkṣāś ca baṭa-vṛkṣāś ca kapittha-vṛkṣāś ca āmra-vṛkṣāś ca vṛkṣāḥ

synonyms: aśvattha-vṛkṣāḥ—banyan trees; ca—and; baṭa-vṛkṣāḥ—fig trees; ca—and; kapittha-vṛkṣāḥ—a type of tree named kapittha; ca—and; āmra-vṛkṣāḥ—mango trees; ca—and; vṛkṣāḥ—all indicated by the word "trees."
translation: " 'By the plural word vṛkṣāḥ [trees], all trees, such as banyan trees, fig trees, kapittha trees and mango trees, are indicated.'
